topic.title: How can I clone clearnet site to ZeroNet ?
topic.body:
I really like zeronet but it lacks contents to attrack non-techy user. So I would like to clone clearnet sites and seed them on zeronet. 
I made a test, I cloned a part of wiki.archlinux.org with httrack. But site is already to big to be signed for zeronet. I could use optional files but what should I list as optional ? It will be a huge list... Or should I create a Zite for each wiki topic ? It would demand to rewrite all html link.
Have anyone done that ? Can bigfile support resolve that ? What would you recommand ? :)

1_1Fz1UWSCDr6RCVf7vR3BwoCg9vftURH97i.body:
Quelques liens utiles...

 * Il y a déjà un site français mais c'est simplement un wiki qui liste des sites sur le clearnet
 http://127.0.0.1:43110/122nvvhftBeZq9a47WAdg9RpkzLeWTJuw5/

 * ZeroTV qui marche plutot bien mais ne peut être mis à jour que par son propriétaire
 /1HwH4hfRhohJGVtZMBYprYKyHcuJNwL4sZ/

 * ZeroTorrent qui est une base de données de torrents en tout genre où tout le monde peut poster et c'est génial
 /ZeroTorrent.bit/

 * KopyKate qui stream des vidéos en utilisant webtorrent
 /1aCq7GiJfUfGZ4GftjYaYbsEngPFzcxvN/

 * Lola qui développe un plugin de streaming pour zeronet
 /Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Profile/1BLueGvui1GdbtsjcKqCf4F67uKfritG49/1KuwwnkAtVrfnyhv8pyGRxLqzNZbEkJt2u/lola@zeroid.bit

 * tu trouvera surement de l'aide ici
 /fr.0rc.bit/
 /1Vp5LH4wegCaqeB72yMw2jgNdVm4aR7ET/

J'aimerais beaucoup pouvoir télécharger des séries et films en vostfr ou vf sur zeronet. Etant limité au niveau programmation j'envisageais de cloner le nouveau t411.si sur zeronet mais je serais ravi de voir ton projet sur zeronet :) Bon courage

2_1Hhrr5AbgeyBtF1cnLttTYMZjk5VrRQ5cY.body:
it looks promising :
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1AJB5rtjfB9imjDGVk5vtRtZp3zgYizbpG/dlinks.html

otherwise here is some torrent searchengines :

http://www.btsay.org
http://www.magnetdl.com
source : https://cryptpad.fr/pad/#/1/view/WxudP--GyURuu3tp1O93Zw/kZszEdgZvVG3NgjSEf0J2TSemo1D9X-C5X16anml57Q/

3_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6nvuBPu.body:
> [krixano](#comment_6_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6nvuBPu): It's fixed now!
How did you edit your post ? not by UI ?

> [krixano](#comment_7_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6nvuBPu): What do you mean? I just used the pencil button that shows up to the left the the body when you hover over it to edit it.

That was exactly what I meant ^^ I just need to sleep more. thank you :)

1_1NDhNyavxhFyWJHscjPu5qYjMbpfKSDVzt.body:
> [elspru](#comment_51_1A3XsuLB6P7LQPCw1QWASG7RGSwrCv6Xib): Yes, I've done it.First create a new zite,Use httrack to download the zite.Set the "size_limit":  to be larger in megabytes than the current size of you site,in for your zite in the data/sites.json filethen it will sign properly [...]

Thanks elspru. Maybe I'll try to script link replacement then. I already clone 1.2Go and it's not finished. Also, it could be good for user to only download topic by topic. Otherwise it's kind of unusable.
